issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Hadoop pipes examples are built but never packaged.
fields.summary: Include hadoop-pipes examples in the release tarball

Tested the before and after, LGTM. Will commit shortly, thanks for the contribution [~lewuathe]!
This affected branch-2 too, so I committed back through branch-2.8. Thanks again Kai for the patch, Allen for finding this issue.
